name: beta-kafka
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program.

There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 5000 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Kafka service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/beta-kafka/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Kafka service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/beta-kafka/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
